name: Galaxian Sleena
overview: Galaxian Sleena is a fast-paced Shoot 'em up for the whole family! Prepare to have a swollen trigger finger as you shoot down aliens and battle four Sleena Overlords while traversing the alien megastructure. You only have a single ship to combat the enemy but luckily it has been armed with a powerful laser cannon that makes quick work of the Sleena's minions. Can you beat the Galaxian Sleena? The game was programmed by W E de Villiers (known as huffelduff on his itch.io) page and published under the eXimietas Software label, which his own personal label, on July 4, 2022.
